overview: Is love truly blind? Ren Hao Ming is a blind rich businessman who hires Ruan Qing Tian as his assistant/caretaker. Although Qing Tian was forced to take the job by her stepmother, she ends up falling in love with Hao Ming through their close daily interactions. Hao Ming undergoes corneal surgery and regains his vision. He goes in search of Qing Tian to propose to her,...
title: The Maid of the Blind Master
